import{QueryClient}from'@tanstack/react-query';import axios from'axios';const initInstance=config=>{const instance=axios.create({timeout:5000,...config,headers:{Accept:'application/json','Content-Type':'application/json',...config.headers}});return instance;};export const BASE_URL='https://api.example.com';// TODO: 추후 서버 API 주소 변경 필요
export const fetchInstance=initInstance({baseURL:'https://api.example.com'});export const queryClient=new QueryClient({defaultOptions:{queries:{retry:1,refetchOnMount:true,refetchOnReconnect:true,refetchOnWindowFocus:true}}});
